description: Returns information about the status of Kinesis streaming.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table being described. You can also provide the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table in this parameter.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table being described.

nested_items.name: KinesisDataStreamDestinations
nested_items.description: The list of replica structures for the table being described.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for a specific Kinesis data stream.

nested_items.name: DestinationStatusDescription
nested_items.description: The human-readable string that corresponds to the replica status.

nested_items.name: ApproximateCreationDateTimePrecision
nested_items.description: The precision of the Kinesis data stream timestamp. The values are either MILLISECOND or MICROSECOND.
